prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that burrows underground and has sharp claws.
I want a Pokemon with a spiky back and the ability to roll into a ball.
Generate a creature inspired by hedgehogs with a sandy color and fierce demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in deserts and has a tough exterior for defense.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon that can dig quickly through various terrains.
Design a Pokemon that has a blend of earthy tones and sharp, protective features.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a creature from the wild, built for survival.
